title: Delicious and generous portions
text: Delicious and generous portions for takeaway, looking forward to visiting the refurbished garden when we can

title: Race on the track!
text: We did a couple of laps of the stadium, one around the top row of seats and then jogging a lap, could have done some races but didn’t fancy my chances against son.,

title: Southern entrance
text: The most amazing building site in the world, wandering around the ancient ruins whilst workers carry on their rebuilding. I do recommend entering or leaving from the southern entrance so that you don’t miss all the relics on the south slopes. Try to come on the 28th October when entrance is free

title: Great architecture
text: The building is fabulous and exhibits fascinating particularly enjoyed the top floor and the excavations beneath.

title: Ideal base
text: There is so much to do from the front door, wether to pop over the road to the couple of cool bars, or stroll up to the hill of muses with the best evening views of the acropolis, or to pop around the corner to the plaka for a host of great value restaurants. The hotel is very comfy with a homely lounge area offering complimentary afternoon tea, and a great dining area. Hope to come back again at a better time.

title: Went here for a couple of
text:
Went here for a couple of nights and particularly enjoyed the mixed grill for 2 which was enough for 3!
Lovely and warm with outside heaters even though it was pouring down on the second nice, lovely touch being given a pot of yoghurt for pudding, on the second night we didn’t feel like it do they gave us ouzo instead.

title: Delicious meal in stunning
text: Delicious meal in stunning location, sat under the trees as a hot day, huge portion of tasty bread worth paying an extra 4 euros for the tsasiki , very Greek with attentive waiters. Went for the beef patty with feta and tomatoes, got 2 delicious burgers with rice and chips for 9 euros. Highly recommend.

title: Still great views
text: Whilst not the most friendly or best value, it is still a wonderful collection of rooms and deckings to see the city from especially if you time your visit at sunset.

title: Wonderful place
text: This little hill is really rewarding to climb with fabulous views in all directions whilst meandering around a maze of paths and the odd bit of history dotted around. Also called the hill of Muses.

title: Restrictions
text: Wonderful feature but currently it has restricted access and unable to sit by the fountain as normal

title: We sat outside with a view
text: We sat outside with a view of the coliseum, delicious anchovies for starter and most entertaining staff, creating a most enjoyable evening,

title: Amazing setting
text: Spent 4 nights here late August sunny 30 every day, wonderful staff, especially the pool guy! Stunning views from pool, due to restrictions allowed a 2 hr slot a day to be fair to everyone. Breakfast restricted a bit but still really tasty. Buses 85 87 51 and tram 3 all stop right outside hotel, plenty of good value local restaurants. Taxi to Ciampino 30 euros

title: Fantastic coffee try the latte
text: Fantastic coffee try the latte and amazing value considering it’s location. Ideal for a quick stop off.

title: Wonderful atmosphere with
text: Wonderful atmosphere with loads of locals, delicious food at a great price, as good indoors as out as the decor is of a street. Litre of drinkable house red for under 10 euros !

title: Enjoyable continental experience
text: Enjoyable continental experience with tapas on the menu, pick carefully and you will have a great meal, preferably sitting outside on the terrace .

title: Fabulous setting with good
text: Fabulous setting with good service, be ready for very well done bacon and avoid the breakfast tea bag , which was disgusting, latte a much better bet.

title: Popped in as ola del mar was
text: Popped in as ola del mar was closed on a Monday, and I think we just made the wrong choices. I think that it’s a paella specialist but it has to be for 2. Pleasant enough otherwise.

title: Charming restaurant who give
text: Charming restaurant who give a great welcome, especially the Sicilian waiter. Decent food for a pleasant supper.

title: Very friendly welcome, delicious
text: Very friendly welcome, delicious tapas, great value for such a central yet well hidden away restaurant. Very Spanish

title: Tranquil setting for delicious
text: Tranquil setting for delicious drinks, we had the lemonade, which tasted like a non alcoholic mojito! Well worth a try

title: Really friendly welcome, super
text: Really friendly welcome, super comfy chairs, a great place to watch the world pass by and tasty tapas

title: Comfy!
text: If you want a truest comfortable viewing experience, this is it, with a bar before hand and luxury seats.

title: Totally awesome venue
text: This spa is second to none especially with the new flotation Dead Sea experience. Also the buffet is incredible value!

title: Great holiday
text: Superb staff always obliging and helpful. Some fun shops just outside the hotel as good a price as in the Old town, if you barter well. Also a lovely 5 / 10 min walk through the sister hotel opposite down to the beach. Some decent slides in the water park for all ages. Good food and great cocktails every night in the panorama bar. Egypt seemed pretty empty of tourists right now, so no trouble doing any activity you want for a good price, I suggest you shop around a little rather than book up at your welcome meeting. Plenty of sun during the day but really cool at night when we went, even snowed on the pyramids! Only real hassle we had was when leaving at the airport and the trolley handlers being over demanding. Otherwise great holiday totally relaxing.
